questions.question_text: What is the primary purpose of HR Topic Categories?
What are the benefits of the HR application being scoped? (Choose three.)

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: ABC
HR Fundamentals ebook page 15:
Scoped applications provide an additional layer of control over HR data. HR can move at their desired pace, independent of IT. Provides HR the autonomy and control needed to configure and manage all aspects of the HR application and Employee Center Pro. Confidential information is hidden from System Administrator and users who are not HR personnel.

Selected Answer: ABC
Answer is ABC.
The last 2 choices are incorrect.

Selected Answer: ABC
These make senseâ€¦ABC

Selected Answer: ABC
Correct answer is ABC

choices.E: HR department has full control of the global application.
choices.C: HR department has more autonomy to manage all aspects of HRSD.
choices.B: Allows HR Admins to configure the HR application.
choices.D: Allows the System Administrator complete control.
choices.A: Provides an additional layer of control over HR data.

questions.question_text:
The HR Admin [sn_hr_core.admin] role allows the user to add members to groups.
What additional role is needed for an HR Admin to remove users from groups?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: A
HR Implementation ebook page 162: Only a user with the user_admin role may add and remove roles from a user or group. In the base instance, the HR Admin role does not include the User Admin role.

Selected Answer: A
Answer is A.
pg. 162 in Tokyo implementation ebook.

Selected Answer: A
A: User Admin

Selected Answer: A
Correct Answer is A

choices.B: The HR Criteria on the Response Template record
choices.C: The table and conditions on the Response Template record
choices.A: The HR Criteria on the HR Service
choices.D: The User Criteria on the HR Service

questions.question_text:
On the HR Case form, some HR Services have associated Response templates.
What determines which HR Services have Response Templates?

discussion.content:
Selected Answer: C
HR Fundamentals ebook page 111: the table and conditions selected on the Response Template record determine which Response Templates are available to use on an HR case
C. The table and conditions on the Response Template record is Correct
